mapper.insert: insert into t_skintestliquid (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, skintestPACKID, DRUGQRCODE, DRUGID, DRUGNAME, DELAYTIME, SPECS, ORIGIN, BATCHNUMBER, SKINTESTRESULT, OPERATENAME, OPERATEWORKNUMBER, CHECKNAME, CHECKWORKNUMBER, STARTAT, FINISHAT, DRUGCOMMNAME, STATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skintestpackid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugqrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delaytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skintestresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateworknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkworknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{drugcommname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_skintestliquid set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skintestPACKID = #{skintestpackid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUGQRCODE = #{drugqrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUGID = #{drugid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUGNAME = #{drugname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELAYTIME = #{delaytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECS = #{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCHNUMBER = #{batchnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKINTESTRESULT = #{skintestresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATENAME = #{operatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATEWORKNUMBER = #{operateworknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKNAME = #{checkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKWORKNUMBER = #{checkworknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARTAT = #{startat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FINISHAT = #{finishat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DRUGCOMMNAME = #{drugcommname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, skintestPACKID, DRUGQRCODE, DRUGID, DRUGNAME, DELAYTIME, SPECS, ORIGIN, BATCHNUMBER, SKINTESTRESULT, OPERATENAME, OPERATEWORKNUMBER, CHECKNAME, CHECKWORKNUMBER, STARTAT, FINISHAT, DRUGCOMMNAME, STATUS from t_skintestliquid where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, skintestPACKID, DRUGQRCODE, DRUGID, DRUGNAME, DELAYTIME, SPECS, ORIGIN, BATCHNUMBER, SKINTESTRESULT, OPERATENAME, OPERATEWORKNUMBER, CHECKNAME, CHECKWORKNUMBER, STARTAT, FINISHAT, DRUGCOMMNAME, STATUS from t_skintestliquid
